Enter Group

Opens the selected group, so that you can edit the individual objects. If the selected group contains nested group, you can repeat this command on the subgroups. This command does not permanently ungroup the objects.

To access this command...

Choose Format - Group - Enter Group (text documents, spreadsheets)

Choose Modify - Enter Group (drawing documents)

Open context menu - choose Enter Group

Enter Group


To select an individual object in a group, hold down Command Ctrl , and then click the object.

Groups

Exit Group
